thread.title: A luxury travel agency for pampered pooches in Hong Kong

title: A luxury travel agency for pampered pooches in Hong Kong
text:
A luxury travel agency for pampered pooches in Hong Kong Friday, March 23, 2018 - 01:26 
Some dog owners in Hong Kong are spending thousands of dollars on luxury holidays for their pets, including flights on private planes. It's part of a growing trend in China where consumer spending on pets is booming. Ryan Brooks reports.
